dict.string:
. "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/webpreview.sh" html_header "Run ‘${TM_FILENAME}’"
if [ ! -x "$TM_FILEPATH" ]; then
res=$(iconv <<APPLESCRIPT -f utf-8 -t mac|osascript 2>/dev/null tell app "TextMate" to return button returned of ¬ (display dialog "To run “${TM_FILENAME}” as a shell script it needs to be executable.\n\nWould you like to make it executable?" ¬ buttons {"Cancel", "Make Executable"} ¬ with icon 1 default button 2) APPLESCRIPT)
if [[ "$res" != "Make Executable" ]]; then echo '<script>window.close()</script>'; abort; exit; fi chmod a+x "$TM_FILEPATH" fi
"$TM_FILEPATH"|pre echo "Program exited with status $?." html_footer
